mapper.select: SELECT J.ID ID, J.NAME NAME, J.LOCATION LOCATION, J.BODY BODY, J.CREATED_AT CREATED_AT, J.MEMBERID MEMBERID, IF(J.ANONYMOUS=1 AND M.MEMBERID!=#{memberid}, '익명', M.USERNAME) AS USERNAME, J.LOCATIONID LOCATIONID, IF(J.ANONYMOUS=1 AND M.MEMBERID!=#{memberid}, 'https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52685250/73902320-c72d6c00-48d8-11ea-82b4-eb9bfebfe9fb.png', M.IMG) AS IMG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKEPOST WHERE CATEGORYID=4 AND POSTID=J.ID) LIKES, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTPOST WHERE CATEGORYID=4 AND POSTID=J.ID) COMMENTS FROM JMT J, MEMBERS M WHERE J.MEMBERID=M.MEMBERID ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT J.ID ID, J.NAME NAME, J.LOCATION LOCATION, J.BODY BODY, J.CREATED_AT CREATED_AT, J.MEMBERID MEMBERID, IF(J.ANONYMOUS=1 AND M.MEMBERID!=#{memberid}, '익명', M.USERNAME) AS USERNAME, J.LOCATIONID LOCATIONID, IF(J.ANONYMOUS=1 AND M.MEMBERID!=#{memberid}, 'https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52685250/73902320-c72d6c00-48d8-11ea-82b4-eb9bfebfe9fb.png', M.IMG) AS IMG FROM JMT J, MEMBERS M WHERE J.MEMBERID=M.MEMBERID AND J.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JMT(NAME, LOCATION, BODY, CREATED_AT, MEMBERID, ANONYMOUS, LOCATIONID) VALUES(#{name},#{location},#{body},now(), #{memberid}, #{anonymous}, #{locationid})
mapper.update: UPDATE JMT SET NAME=#{name}, LOCATION=#{location}, BODY=#{body}, ANONYMOUS=#{anonymous}, LOCATIONID=#{locationid} WHERE ID=#{id}
